raw_infobox.name: Kevin Garnett
raw_infobox.caption: Garnett with the Boston Celtics in 2008
raw_infobox.highlights:
* NBA champion (2008)
* NBA Most Valuable Player Award (2003)
* 15× NBA All-Star (1997, 1998, 2000–2011, 2013)
* NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player Award (2003)
* 4× All-NBA Team (1999, 2002, 2003, 2007)
* 3× All-NBA Team (2000, 2001, 2004)
* 2× All-NBA Team (1998, 2006)
* NBA Defensive Player of the Year Award (2007)
* 9× NBA All-Defensive Team (1999–2004, 2007, 2008, 2010)
* 3× NBA All-Defensive Team (2005, 2006, 2011)
* 4× List of National Basketball Association annual rebounding leaders (2003–2006)
* NBA All-Rookie Second Team (1995)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* No. 5 Boston Celtics accomplishments and records#Retired numbers
* Mr. Basketball USA (1995)
* Illinois Mr. Basketball (1995)
* McDonald's All-American Game (1995 McDonald's All-American Boys Game)
* South Carolina Mr. Basketball (1994)
